verse: मन्निमित्तं कृतं पापं मद्धर्माय च कल्पते । मामनादृत्य धर्मोऽपि पापं स्यान्मत्प्रभावतः ॥

terms.मत् प्रभावतः: due to the influence of me, due to my power

meaning: Meaning: "Any sinful act performed with the thought of harming me is considered as a sin. However, even righteous actions performed without regarding me may also be considered as a sin due to my influence."
